The world would come to a complete standstill as most machines and vehicles run on oil. People would have to rely on alternative forms of energy like wind, solar, and hydro power.
The price of oil would skyrocket as it would become a scarce resource. This would lead to inflation and economic instability.
Industries that heavily rely on oil like aviation, shipping, and construction would be severely impacted. This would lead to job losses and a decline in the economy.
The transportation system would collapse as most cars, trucks, and buses run on oil. People would have to rely on public transportation or find alternative ways to get around.

The environment would be impacted as oil spills and drilling operations would have a devastating effect on marine life and ecosystems. The world would have to find more sustainable ways to extract and use oil.
